preview.caption: Step into Restaurant and feel at home

about.title: ~ About us ~
about.description: Whether you’re in the mood for a ‘small’ poutine or a ‘big’ salad, ‘just one’ beer or a double shot espresso, when it satisfies your tastebuds, it’s all good.Inspired by local flavours and Montrealers’ favourite dishes, Restaurant cooks serve up comforting and seasonal dishes that evoke and create the best memories.

services.title: The Monocle Restaurant Awards 2017
services.description: Far from the hifalutin haute cuisine of other restaurant rundowns, Monocle’s third annual Restaurant Awards celebrate and elevate an endangered species: humble neighbourhood restaurants, smiley staff and simple service that often get lost in the fuss and froth of fine dining

services.title: The Best Chef Award
services.description: Selection of the top 300 chefs in the world voted by chefs themselves as well as by culinary professional

services.title: The World Drinks Awards Winner
services.description: The World Drinks Awards are the global awards recognising spirit drinks and the many styles within these categories. There are two separate strands to these awards – one is for taste and the other is for design excellence.
